## Stats type

A valid champion stat that affects their in-game interactions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Stats = 'hp' | 'mp' | 'ms' | 'armor' | 'spellBlock' | 'attackRange' | 'hpRegen' | 'mpRegen' | 'crit' | 'attackDamage' | 'attackSpeed';
```
